text: Mikhail Valentinovich Trukhlov (; born 13 October 1969 in Rybinsk) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:People from Rybinsk Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Arsenal Tula players Category:FC Dynamo Stavropol players Category:FC Khimik-Arsenal players Category:Association football forwards
title: Mikhail Trukhlov
